home-1.title: Discover the most prestigious university in Taiwan

Guided by independent thought and a pioneering spirit of enterprise, students at NTU become a part of the nation‚Äôs richest center of learning and receive a diverse and superlative education.

Also, we are introducing the NTU Study Abroad Expo Points Reward scheme, exclusively for NTU students. Don‚Äôt miss out on this great opportunity!
